techmeme.title: Pinterest shares dropped 20% on Wednesday after forecasting Q4 revenue below estimates as advertising took a hit from retailers dealing with tariffs (Jaures Yip/CNBC)
Amazon opens a new 10,000-square-foot automated Whole Foods store in Pennsylvania partly staffed by robots; customers can scan and order items from the aisles (Matt Day/Bloomberg)
France begins the process to temporarily suspend Shein for "the time necessary for the platform to demonstrate" it has scrubbed its website of illegal products (Wall Street Journal)
A Chinese court sentences five top members of an infamous Myanmar mafia to death, convicting 21 in total, as Beijing continues its crackdown on scam operations (Koh Ewe/BBC)
Sony rolls out PlayStation Portal cloud streaming, letting PlayStation Premium Plus members stream select titles without a PS5 connection, in testing since 2024 (Ash Parrish/The Verge)
